title: Auto-generate lint rules from repeated code review feedback
description: From Boris Cherny interview: 'Every time I did a code review, if I was commenting about a particular kind of issue... Build tooling to: 1) Track repeated feedback patterns in PRs 2) Suggest lint rule generation when threshold hit 3) Auto-generate ESLint/Svelte rules from patterns.

comments.author: micahjohnson
comments.text: Upstream feature request for github.com/steveyegge/beads. bv has -repo flag for filtering but no automatic directory detection. Would need to read cwd, match against package paths, and weight issues with matching labels.

title: Learn MCP: Add reflection analysis and methodology coaching
description:
Enhance Learn MCP to support active methodology adoption (not just passive learning):

1. Reflection analysis: Parse reflections for depth, concepts understood, and implied actions
2. Audit-based recommendations: Weak triad-audit scores surface relevant lessons
3. learn_coach tool: Real-time methodology guidance during coding
4. Ethos construction API: Users define their own principles derived from canon
5. Continuous monitoring: Weekly audit digests and trend tracking

See paper: createsomething.io/papers/ethos-transfer-agentic-engineering

Transforms Learn MCP from 'learning about' (Vorhandenheit) to 'dwelling within' (Zuhandenheit).

title: Strip creator-injected JSON-LD schema from template marketplace previews
description:
Template creators are adding their own JSON-LD schema markup (e.g., SportsActivityLocation on Fuerza, custom schema on Awakee) which appears on Webflow marketplace pages and conflicts with the template page schema.

**Root cause**: Google crawls iframe src URLs (*.webflow.io template previews) separately and attributes their schema to the parent marketplace page.

**Fix**: Add `<meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow">` to individual template preview sites that have problematic schema.

**Affected templates**:
- Fuerza (fuerza.webflow.io) - SportsActivityLocation schema
- Awakee - custom schema

**Limitation**: Only have access to Marketplace and individual templates, not webflow.io infrastructure.
close_reason: Fixed at Marketplace level: iframe now uses data-src with JS lazy-loading, preventing Google from crawling template preview URLs

title: [CRITICAL] HTML sanitizer corrupts valid HTML output
description: ## Description The sanitizeHtml function at Step 4 encodes ALL < and > characters to < and >, then attempts to restore valid tags via regex. This approach corrupts valid HTML because (1) the restoration regex only matches a subset of allowed tags, missing 'table', 'thead', 'tbody', 'tr', 'th', 'td' closing tags, (2) attributes containing < or > will break, and (3) nested tags may not be properly restored. For example, '' would remain as '</table>' after sanitization. ## Deta

title: [HIGH] XSS via unsanitized HTML rendering
description: ## Description The {@html data.asset.rejectionFeedbackHtml} directive renders raw HTML from the Airtable database without sanitization. close_reason: Fixed by sanitizing HTML content in airtable.ts before rendering. Added sanitize.ts utility that strips dangerous elements/attributes while preserving safe formatting.
